component.name: CloverPlugin
component.excludes: minidraw/standard/StandardDrawing.java, minidraw/standard/StandardDrawingView.java, minidraw/boardgame/BoardDrawing.java, minidraw/boardgame/BoardFigure.java, minidraw/boardgame/BoardActionTool.java, minidraw/breakthrough/**, minidraw/visual/**

task.summary:
Gammamon impl. start. Following has changed:
- Refactored package structure reflecting another strategy type -winner - Refactored the MoveValidatorFactory to be a more general RulesFactory - Created WinnerStrategy interface and implemented the SimpleWinnerStrategy and validated the test suite is passing all tests

Gammamon impl. start. Following has changed:
- Refactored package structure reflecting another strategy type -winner - Refactored the MoveValidatorFactory to be a more general RulesFactory - Created WinnerStrategy interface and implemented the SimpleWinnerStrategy and validated the test suite is passing all tests
Fixed library include problem for Torben
refactored factory and added TestBetamonCustomBoard example
Added AnimatedBoardDrawing, still work in progress
Added AnimatedBoardDrawing, still work in progress
added new ai player (dummy) fixed bug in movevalidator
AnimatedBoardDrawing now uses factory for initalization timerInterval and EasingFunction moved from AnimatedBoardDrawing to factory
Dice now change ruring roll, and uses correct colors
refactored factory for animated board drawing
simplified initial state + aiplayer state fixed + added unittest
refactored package structure in minidraw changed naming
refactored some more package structure in minidraw
moved some files within test packages added unit test of state context impl
simple game now supports ai vs ai player
Changed nam on EasingFunction parameter Added HotgammonAnimatedBoardDrawingFactoryTest
